column5: A very happy Canada Day to our friends and neighbors to the North! Hope you enjoy the long weekend and the fish are biting...
I agree. Enjoy your holiday and thanks for letting us enjoy your fishing resource!
Thanks Guys and You enjoy your up coming holiday as well.
Thank you, we'll have a cold Labatt's, or two.
WHAT HE SAID.I see more & more of you guys everyday up my way,keep on coming & welcome,GOOD Fishin my freinds.

Greetings from Gull Rock and Happy Canada Day!!! "Gracie" turned one today...........many of you have seen her on the front of our boat on the lake in the past 7 weeks. We lost our Bandit 2 years ago and never thought we would have another dog. Too painful. Last year while at Gull Rock our Gracie was born on Canada Day and so today we had a big party at Mary's on South Bay............ So Canada Day is a pretty 'dog gone" special day in more ways than one............Happy Canada Day. Sorry about the sappy part.

I can't name many other countries in the world that we could share a 4000 mile (or so) border with peacefully for this many years. May it continue. Thank you, Canada. Nimstug.....the true north strong and free.
Thank you Canada for sharing your great natural beauty and resources with your southern neighbors I hope to get back to Lac Seul and Goose Bay Camp next June!!
